channel.title: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation
channel.description: What are cons and pros of Torify Other Operating Systems(ex Windows) and installing virtualbox in Virtualbox Whonix Workstation or KVM Whonix Workstation and run Windows in Workstation ?

item.title: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Nested Virtualization is ok. Leaks are no more likely than without Nested Virtualization.

Whonix

Nested Virtualization

It is possible to run Virtual Machines inside Virtual Machines (VMs). That is called Nested Virtualization.

Read full topic
item.source: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation

item.title: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation
item.dc:creator: Bobie
item.description:
Yes, I know about this documentation sections. Just asking if method 2 is possible ? Installing a Vbox in Whonix Workstation and change proxy settings using settings of OS installed in VM. Asking if it may leak or will have some major errors like leak my real ip etc

Read full topic
item.source: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation

item.title: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Bobie:

What are cons and pros of Torify Other Operating Systems(ex Windows) and installing virtualbox in Virtualbox Whonix Workstation or KVM Whonix Workstation and run Windows in Workstation ?

Whonix

Other Operating Systems

Anonymize any Operating System! Your operating system tunneled through the Tor Anonymity Network! Create your Custom-Whonix-Workstation!

Bobie:

Second question What’s difference between chaining using “User > Tor > Proxy > Internet

Bobie:

User > Tor (Whonix Workstation) > Internet

Bobie:

Inside Whonix Workstation

Whonix

Tunnels/Introduction

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User -> Tor -> proxy/VPN/SSH -> Internet) (User -> proxy/VPN/SSH ->...

Bobie:

A Virtualbox installed and a VM with any OS(ex Windows) > Proxify VM using OS settings

Bobie:

There can be some leaks or errors or regarding Whonix Gateway there should be no leaks ?

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_proxy#General

Read full topic

item.title: Difference between Torifying Other Operating Systems and running Other Operating System in Workstation
item.dc:creator: Bobie
item.description:
Second question What’s difference between chaining using “User > Tor > Proxy > Internet using method from docs and Torify Other Operating System” AND
User > Tor (Whonix Workstation) > Internet
Inside Whonix Workstation
A Virtualbox installed and a VM with any OS(ex Windows) > Proxify VM using OS settings

There can be some leaks or errors or regarding Whonix Gateway there should be no leaks ?

Read full topic
